headerDisplay: Ariston NET Velis/Lydos water heater. Uses cloud API to read/set temperature and power.
footerDisplay: Tip: If the device behaves oddly after changes, remove ariston-cache.json from the Homebridge storage path to force a re-detection of the variant.

gateway.title: Plant ID (optional)
gateway.description: If empty, the plugin will auto-discover the first available Velis/Lydos plant.

pollInterval.title: Poll Interval (seconds)
pollInterval.description: How often to refresh state from the cloud. Default 1800 (30 minutes).

refreshOnGet.title: Refresh on characteristic read (on-demand)
refreshOnGet.description: When you open the accessory in Home/Eve, reading values will trigger a background refresh with a short cooldown.

refreshOnGetCooldownSeconds.title: On-demand refresh cooldown (seconds)
refreshOnGetCooldownSeconds.description: Minimum gap between on-demand refreshes to avoid spamming the API.

eveCharacteristics.title: Expose Eve-only extra fields (AntiLegionella, HeatReq, Showers)
eveCharacteristics.description: Adds Eve-compatible custom characteristics to the Thermostat service; visible in Eve app, not in Apple Home.

extraServices.title: Add extra sensor tiles in Home (optional)
extraServices.description: Adds Motion (Heating Request), Contact (Anti Legionella), and Humidity (Available Showers) services as separate tiles in Home.
